subject: Rowing
lead_paragraph: Harvard defeated Brown by two lengths yesterday to advance to the final of the Ladies Plate for elite eights at the Henley Royal Regatta in Henley-on-Thames, England. In the Diamond Sculls semifinals for international single scullers, Jamie Schroeder from Potomac Boat Club lost to Alan Campbell, who is Britain’s top sculler, by one and a half lengths.In the Remenham Cup semifinals for international women’s eights, Brown lost to the German national squad representing Dortmund Rowing Club.In the Fawley Cup quarterfinals for schoolboy quadruple sculls, Maritime Rowing Club from Norwalk, Conn., lost to Sydney Rowing Club from Australia and the composite crew from Malvern Preparatory School in Pennsylvania and Miami Rowing Club lost by two and a half lengths to Windsor Boys’ School of England.
